titleStmt.title: Apophthegmata aurea, regia, Carolina apophthegms, I. Theological, II. Moral, III. Political / collected out of the imcomparable Eikōn basilikē of His Most Glorious Majestie King Charls [sic] the First.
Eikon basilike. Selections.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Gauden, John, 1605-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Du-gard for Francis Eglesfield ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Charles I and also to John Gauden. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
